org.apache.hive.hcatalog.api

Class HCatTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hive.hcatalog.api.HCatTable

  • @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Stable
public class HCatTable
extends Object
    The HCatTable is a wrapper around org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.api.Table.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  HCatTable.TableAttribute
      Attributes that can be compared between HCatTables.
      static class  HCatTable.Type 

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static EnumSet<HCatTable.TableAttribute> DEFAULT_COMPARISON_ATTRIBUTES
      The default set of attributes that can be diffed between HCatTables.
      static String DEFAULT_INPUT_FORMAT_CLASS 
      static String DEFAULT_OUTPUT_FORMAT_CLASS 
      static String DEFAULT_SERDE_CLASS 
      static EnumSet<HCatTable.TableAttribute> NO_DIFF
      2 HCatTables are considered equivalent if lhs.diff(rhs).equals(NO_DIFF) == true;

      • diff

        public EnumSet<HCatTable.TableAttribute> diff(HCatTable rhs,
                                              EnumSet<HCatTable.TableAttribute> attributesToCheck)
        Method to compare the attributes of 2 HCatTable instances.
        Parameters:
        rhs - The other table being compared against. Can't be null.
        attributesToCheck - The list of TableAttributes being compared.
        Returns:
        EnumSet<TableAttribute> containing all the attribute that differ between this and rhs. Subset of attributesToCheck.

      • diff

        public EnumSet<HCatTable.TableAttribute> diff(HCatTable rhs)
        Method to compare the attributes of 2 HCatTable instances. Only the DEFAULT_COMPARISON_ATTRIBUTES are compared.
        Parameters:
        rhs - The other table being compared against. Can't be null.
        Returns:
        EnumSet<TableAttribute> containing all the attribute that differ between this and rhs. Subset of DEFAULT_COMPARISON_ATTRIBUTES.

      • resolve

        public HCatTable resolve(HCatTable rhs,
                         EnumSet<HCatTable.TableAttribute> attributes)
                  throws HCatException
        Method to "adopt" the specified attributes from rhs into this HCatTable object.
        Parameters:
        rhs - The "source" table from which attributes are to be copied from.
        attributes - The set of attributes to be copied from rhs. Usually the result of this.diff(rhs).
        Returns:
        This HCatTable
        Throws:
        HCatException
